entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
